dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: The Citeseer dataset consists of citation networks representing published documents as nodes and the citation links between them as undirected edges. Each node is represented by a sparse binary Bag-of-Words feature vector extracted from articles’ abstracts and a class label representing the articles’ subject.
dcterms:title: Citeseer

dcterms:creator: Z. Yang
W. W. Cohen
R. Salakhutdinov
dcterms:description: The Cora dataset is a citation network where each node represents a research paper and edges represent citations between them. Each paper is represented by a Bag-of-Words feature vector and is classified into one of several categories.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: Z. Yang
W. W. Cohen
R. Salakhutdinov
dcterms:description: The Pubmed dataset consists of a citation network of scientific publications in the field of medicine. Each node represents a publication, and edges represent citations. Each publication is represented by a Bag-of-Words feature vector and is classified into one of several categories.
dcterms:title: Pubmed
